skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: zen meditation
Developer Terms of Use
des:
Zen Meditation is the Alexa skill that offers guided sessions to help you find inner calm and reach a state of deep meditation. With over 10 unique sessions, each lasting 10 minutes, and featuring a variety of soothing voices and peaceful background sounds, this skill is designed to center your mind and body, enhancing your meditation practice.

Unlock Pro Features to enjoy:

• Guided sessions with professional, soothing voices
• A selection of background sounds ideal for mindfulness and relaxation
• Unlimited access with no restrictions
• Regularly updated meditation programs
• Full access to all session lengths

We value your feedback to help us improve and provide the best meditation and relaxation experience.

Enjoy your journey to inner peace!
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
